Posts.Content: Aug 18, 2013 12:57PM emanderson wrote: Hi everyone I did receive my results last Monday and they were benign I have a intraductal papilloma. They scheduled me with a breast surgeon who suggested I have it removed so the surgery is scheduled for August 30 but I'm still a bit nervous because the doctor said they like to go in to make sure there aren't any underlying abnormalities like noninvasive breast cancer. All of that scares me. I just had my biopsy last Friday and now I'm feeling something like a small lump right by nipple and where they did the biopsy. I wasn't feeling it before and now after everything I feel it. The Papilloma that was initially found was found in a duct and is small half granule of rice. What could this be all of a sudden?
Posts.Title: Nipple discharge emanderson Momcat1962

Posts.Content: Aug 9, 2013 08:26PM emanderson wrote: Hi everyone I had my biopsy done today and it wasn't as bad as I thought it was going to be. They had me watch this video first on what was going to happen within the biopsy and I just started to cry. The tech came in for me to sign some consent forms and reassured me everything was going to be ok. Then be doctor came in and said the same so it did give me a sigh of relief. In the procedure room was the doctor who did the biopsy, tech and another doctor who assisted at the ultrasound machine. I asked how big or small was it that they were seeing and she stated it was very tiny like half of a granule of rice and it was located in a duct in my nipple. They took five samples and they did that for precautionary reasons. I'm at home a little sore and bruised but will be receiving my results in 1 to 2 business days. So I guess by Tuesday or Wednesday next week I should be hearing something. Has anyone experienced something like this before? Still nervous and scared and I feel all alone.
Posts.Title: Nipple discharge emanderson Momcat1962

Posts.Content: emanderson wrote: I just noticed that when I wake up in the morning may have small brown stains on my Tshirt I sometimes sleep in. Posts.Content: Aug 2, 2013 10:12PM emanderson wrote: Ok everyone I just noticed that the leakage is very small like a tiny little bubble coming out like a pin point of the bottom of my nipple and it looks clear. It seems to look a little brown once it stains my shirt I sleep in but never anything huge; very very tiny. I just got out of the bathtub and when I put my clothes on I felt something cold and looked and it was a real tiny bit of leakage. I haven't noticed any since the first time I posted on July 25. Is this something serious? Because if so I need to prepare myself for the breast specialist appointment I have Wednesday. I'm having anxiety because every where I research it states if its clear and coming from only one breast it's serious? I'm really scared and concerned. I try to stay off the Internet but its hard.
Posts.Title: Nipple discharge emanderson Momcat1962

Posts.Content: Aug 8, 2013 01:47PM emanderson wrote: Hi everyone, I went to my breast specialist appointment yesterday. The nurse practitioner did a thorough breast exam on me and was able to see the leakage once she pressed on certain areas of the breast. So you ordered a mammogram and ultrasound which I took immediately after seeing her. The mammogram was fine and the doctor herself completed the ultrasound and stated that she seen a small something she assumed is a papillioma in duct in my nipple. She also stated that it could be thick secretion. I have a biopsy scheduled for tomorrow and I'm really nervous. Could this be cancerous? Has anyone ever had one of these removed? If so how was the surgery and how long did it take? I'm SCARED!! Please HELP!
Posts.Title: Nipple discharge emanderson Momcat1962

Posts.Content: Aug 10, 2013 09:14AM - edited Aug 10, 2013 09:15AM by emanderson Yes I had a core needle biopsy and when it was being done it wasnt so bad but I'm feeling a little discomfort since yesterday after it was done. Has anyone ever had a small and I mean small something and it was nothing serious? The doctors told me they see something in a duct in my nipple that is half of a granule of rice has anyone every experienced this and was it something serious or nothing serious? It all started with me seeing a very little clear yellow discharge coming from my nipple and seeing very small stains on my shirt. I just want to prepare myself for when I get my results Monday or Tuesday. Can someone please help me?
